template_reference.name: exts
template_reference.comment: temporarily setting to physical_infantry so that it will fire its weapon properly.

template_reference.name: on_start_paradropping_action_tree
template_reference.comment: Functionality to run when you start dropping, ideally it would just last until the the paradrop is over, but I used conditions to manually end it. Currently this just disables capture until they've landed.
